options.content:
# Latency Metrics Through The Stack


Note that latency metrics are 
usually subsuming latencies down 
the stack. So you need to find 
the lower-most metric that 
exhibits high latencies.

## Analyze CPU


Watch out for correlation with

1. CPU load
2. JVM Garbage collection
 * safepoint_count
 * safepoint_total_time

 If you see pattern that correspond 
 to your problems they might be 
 CPU bound. 
 It could also point out that garbage collection can be tuned.

panels.description: Rate across safe point counts for metadata services, sorted by hostname.
panels.title: GC Safepoint Count

options.content:
## Backpressure / Admission Control

Watch out for

1. Blocked RPC connections

panels.title: RPC Blocked Connections
